execution_quality: The agent correctly read the existing command code to understand current implementation and began planning the enhancements, but the work was interrupted before implementation started.
work_category: Feature enhancement planning for CLI output formatting. The agent analyzed requirements for a --list command enhancement involving table layout, session ID formatting, and description columns.
summary: The agent began work on enhancing a CLI --list command by reading the existing implementation and creating a structured task list for the three requested enhancements (full-width table, session ID elision, description column). The work was interrupted before implementation, leaving the task at the planning stage. Alignment is partial because while the agent understood the requirements, no actual implementation was completed to verify correct execution.
follow_up_pattern: User interrupted the work after initial planning phase (TodoWrite was the last action before interruption). This suggests either the user wanted to provide additional guidance, realized additional context was needed, or lost connection.
